segments.text: There's a double feature at the cinema this Saturday . Do you want to go with me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What are the movies that are playing ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There's an action movie with Harrison Ford and a chick flick with Susan Abandon .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I've never seen a movie I don't like that had Harrison Ford in it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . What time does it start and do you want to meet me there ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It starts at one and yea , let's meet there . It's the cinema on the corner of Lincoln and Main .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Great ! I have a coupon for free popcorn at that theater !
segments.speaker: S2
